TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
Khalkus
This place reeks of evil. I smell Undead hiding in the shadows.
This place reeks of evil. I smell Undead hiding in the shadows.
This place reeks of evil. I smell Undead hiding in the shadows.
This place reeks of evil. I smell Undead hiding in the shadows.

Oh, aye, it's a bit gloomy fer sure, but the stonework, she's like nothin' I've ever laid me eyes on before. Beautiful - hypnotic almost - like the Waterfalls of Khaz Elenak, in the days afore the Great Plague. Did I ever tell ye of the Waterfalls that they built...

Oh, aye, it's a bit gloomy fer sure, but the stonework, she's like nothin' I've ever laid me eyes on before. Beautiful - hypnotic almost - like the Waterfalls of Khaz Elenak, in the days afore the Great Plague. Did I ever tell ye of the Waterfalls that they built...

Oh, aye, it's a bit gloomy fer sure, but the stonework, she's like nothin' I've ever laid me eyes on before. Beautiful - hypnotic almost - like the Waterfalls of Khaz Elenak, in the days afore the Great Plague. Did I ever tell ye of the Waterfalls that they built...
Shhh, Khalkus, we do not need any unwanted attention in this place.
Shhh, Khalkus, we do not need any unwanted attention in this place.

Shhh, Khalkus, we do not need any unwanted attention in this place.
Ach - that's just yer Elven blood talkin'. Good solid stonework makes ye a bit squiffy, is all. Now if ye would just...
